## TxBuilder.addMint() method

Adds minting information to the transaction. This includes specifying the policy under which assets are minted, the assets to be minted, and an optional redeemer for Plutus scripts.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addMint(policy: PolicyId, assets: Map<AssetName, bigint>, redeemer?: PlutusData): this;
```

## Parameters

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

policy


</td><td>

[PolicyId](./sdk.core.policyid.md)


</td><td>

The policy ID under which the assets are minted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

assets


</td><td>

Map&lt;[AssetName](./sdk.core.assetname.md)<!-- -->, bigint&gt;


</td><td>

A map of asset names to the amounts being minted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

redeemer


</td><td>

[PlutusData](./sdk.core.plutusdata.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional. A redeemer to be used if the minting policy requires Plutus script validation.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

this
